assetProfile.address2: 3rd Floor, East - Block 5 Jaber Al Mubarak Street Sharq
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Jiyad Holding Company - K.S.C (Public), together with its subsidiaries, owns shares of Kuwaiti or foreign companies, and establishes, manages, lends, and sponsors companies in Kuwait. The company operates through Investment, Education and Training, and Medical Services segments. It also lends money to companies in which it owns 20% or more of the capital of the borrowing company, as well as acts as guarantor on behalf of these companies; owns property rights from patents, industrial trademarks, royalties, or any other related rights and leases it to other companies within or outside Kuwait; owns non-fixed assets and real estate to carry out activities within the limits allowed by law; and invests in financial portfolios managed by specialized companies and entities. In addition, the company buys, sells, and invests in shares, stocks, and bonds; and provides management consultancy services. Further, it offers consulting services related to education and training, as well as establishes educational and training institutions, and offers and issues related programs; and establishes, owns, and manages hospitals, as well as provides medical services. The company was formerly known as Zima Holding Company K.S.C Public and changed its name into Jiyad Holding Company - K.S.C (Public). The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
